analyst.name: Analyst
analyst.description: Responsible for data analysis and insights
analyst.prompt_template: As a data analyst, please analyze the following data and provide insights: {question}

researcher.name: Researcher
researcher.description: Responsible for in-depth research and literature review
researcher.prompt_template: As a researcher, please conduct in-depth research and provide a literature review on the following topic: {question}

decision_maker.name: Decision Maker
decision_maker.description: Responsible for synthesizing analysis results and making decisions
decision_maker.prompt_template: As a decision maker, please provide decision recommendations based on the following analysis results: {question}
